name: Srinivas Kotla

aboutpara: I currently work as a Software development engineer at AWS Identity and Access Management console team. I have 4+ years of professional experience at Frontend and backend development. Iâ€™ve had the opportunity to work on some exciting projects including a multi factoring authentication device registration experience at AWS which is used by all customers of AWS and policy linter for AWS policy editor. I'm a problem-solver at heart and love working collaboratively with others to find innovative solutions. I'm also a fast learner and enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest technology trends.
